column5: Has anyone had any experience at Basket Lake near Dryden? We are looking at a newbie trip and really don't know what to expect. Thanks for any help you can offer.

I've never fished Basket, but I've fished the lakes just to the east and south and have always had good luck. We ussually fish Kakukus, Barrel, Heathwalt, and a few others. I think some in my group have fished Basket, but I couldn't tell you anything about it. Isn't Basket closer to Ignace?
